snippet: Militants opened fire on students taking exams at a school in the troubled northeast, killing at least nine of them, witnesses said Tuesday.
abstract: Boko Haram militants open fire on students taking exams at a school in Nigeria's troubled northeast, killing at least nine of them; attack is second on a school in recent days.
lead_paragraph: Militants opened fire on students taking exams at a school in the troubled northeast, killing at least nine of them, witnesses said Tuesday.

headline.main: 9 Students Killed at School in Nigeria
